ch.lambdaj.group

Class Groups

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.lambdaj.group.Groups

  • public final class Groups
extends Object
    This class consists exclusively of static methods that allow to use the lambdaj grouping feature.
    Author:
    Mario Fusco

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> ArgumentGroupCondition<T> by(T argument)
      Creates a GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
      static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable, Collection<? extends GroupCondition<?>> conditions)
      Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the given grouping conditions
      static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable, GroupCondition<?>... conditions)
      Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the given grouping conditions
      static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable, String... groupers)
      Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the values they have on the named JavaBean proprties

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • by

        public static <T> ArgumentGroupCondition<T> by(T argument)
        Creates a GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
        Parameters:
        argument - The argument defined using the Lambda.on(Class) method on which the items have to be grouped
        Returns:
        A GroupCondition that can be used to group items through the group(Iterable, GroupCondition[]) method

      • group

        public static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable,
                 Collection<? extends GroupCondition<?>> conditions)
        Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the given grouping conditions
        Parameters:
        iterable - The items to be grouped
        conditions - The conditions that define how the items have to be grouped
        Returns:
        The items grouped by the given conditions

      • group

        public static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable,
                 String... groupers)
        Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the values they have on the named JavaBean proprties
        Parameters:
        iterable - The items to be grouped
        groupers - The names of the properties on which the items have to be grouped
        Returns:
        The items grouped on the values of their JavaBean properties

      • group

        public static <T> Group<T> group(Iterable<T> iterable,
                 GroupCondition<?>... conditions)
        Organizes the given list of items in (hierarchy of) groups based on the given grouping conditions
        Parameters:
        iterable - The items to be grouped
        conditions - The conditions that define how the items have to be grouped
        Returns:
        The items grouped by the given conditions
